item.description:
How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 minute story.
Come and enjoy a 1.5 hour workshop on finding a story from your life experience with coaching and pointers on performance. Storytelling is a whole performance art unto itself.

In this workshop you will begin to learn how storytelling differs from theater, stand up and twisting balloon animals and how to mine your life experience to craft a story.

Followed by an open mic opportunity to tell your story to an audience.

Limited to 16 and minimum of 6 to run. A series or workshops that will be taught by professional massmouth tellers who will feature with a ten minute story at the open mic
2nd Mondays from MAY 10th - SEPT 13th


SEPT Andrea Lovett and Esther Piczcek

The cost is $20 for the workshop and you must buy something ($5 minimum) at the venue.

Open mic start at 8PM and is free with a $5 minimum at the venue

group.name: Greater Boston and MA Storytelling Meetup Group

item.name: How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 minute Story - Story workshop and Open mic
